title: Do you feel that most of the Quorans have a similar writing style? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Writing style is unique to every individual. With so many questions on so many topics , the writing style can definitely not be same !!! May be views and perspectives can be same but the way they are put to words are different.
The content of answers may be same but the writing style is different as per their language knowledge, style and selection of words.
